LanguageData.CookPuffedRice5.label: Cook Muri (2)
LanguageData.CookPuffedRice5.description: Puffed rice. The rice is inflated through high pressure and heat.
LanguageData.CookRiceCracker.label: Cook Senbei (2)
LanguageData.CookRiceCracker.description: Prepare Senbei, a type of rice cracker.
LanguageData.CookOkoshi.label: Cook Okoshi (2)
LanguageData.CookOkoshi.description: More eloquently known as Kaminari-okoshi, this rice-based candy bar can be flavor with syrup, soybeans, or mochi.
LanguageData.CookKasutera.label: Bake Baby Castella (2)
LanguageData.CookKasutera.description: Create several servings of Japanese sponge cake.
LanguageData.CookKompeito.label: Bake Kompeito (2)
LanguageData.CookKompeito.description: Create a handful of sugar stars. A favorite of the Demon King.
LanguageData.CookCottonCandy.label: Bake Cotton candy (2)
LanguageData.CookCottonCandy.description: Make several fluffy clouds of pure sugar.
LanguageData.CookBoiledEdamame.label: Cook Boiled Edamame (2)
LanguageData.CookBoiledEdamame.description: Boil soybeans and season with salt.
LanguageData.CookYakitori.label: Cook Yakitori (2)
LanguageData.CookYakitori.description: Grill seasoned meat and onions on a long skewer.„Åè
LanguageData.CookHiyayakko.label: Bake Hiyayakko (2)
LanguageData.CookHiyayakko.description: A chilled cube of tofu with various vegetable toppings.
LanguageData.CookMisotanpo.label: Cook Kiritanpo (2)
LanguageData.CookMisotanpo.description: Pounded rice is toasted on skewers over an open flame. Once toasted, the rice can be dipped in miso for flavor.
